video:video.video:title: Law firm CIO says RPA investment delivering 'material benefits'
video:video.video:description: CIO Vince DiMascio describes how investment in RPA is optimizing legal processes and serving as the glue for integrating business systems at Berry Appelman & Leiden.

video:video.video:title: Law firm CIO successfully deploys RPA and AI to improve client service
video:video.video:description: Vince DiMascio, CIO at Berry Appleman & Leiden, details how his team is using natural language processing, machine learning and RPA to help deliver top-notch legal services.

video:video.video:title: Mercer's 'digital core' built on cloud, microservices, APIs, talent
video:video.video:description: Mercer's chief digital officer, Gail Evans, discusses how the HR giant is building a 'digital core' to replace legacy systems and arm its workforce to thrive in a digital economy.

video:video.video:title: Mercer chief digital officer laser-focused on business value of AI
video:video.video:description: Identifying and communicating the business value of AI are crucial parts of the job for Gail Evans, CDO at Mercer and a finalist for the 2019 MIT Sloan CIO Leadership Award.

video:video.video:title: Automating business processes a top priority for BCBS of Mass. CIO
video:video.video:description: Beth O'Rorke, CIO at Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts, said operational efficiency is a top five priority. One of her approaches? Automating business processes.

video:video.video:title: Digital transformation journey: How to muster the troops
video:video.video:description: Gail Evans was recently promoted from CIO to global chief digital officer at Mercer. Here's how she inspires people to sign on for the firm's digital transformation journey.

video:video.video:title: The benefits of data-driven digital transformation strategies
video:video.video:description: At the 2018 MIT CIO Symposium, speaker Frederic Veron discussed why readily available data and previous knowledge can prove invaluable to digital transformation projects.

video:video.video:title: Land O'Lakes CIO strives to optimize economics of digital farming
video:video.video:description: Land O'Lakes is using AI and machine learning to help the world's food suppliers grow more food more sustainably. The next big goal: A sustainable path to income for farmers.

video:video.video:title: Digital transformation strategies propelled by customer expectations
video:video.video:description: Who's leading digital transformation at Land O'Lakes? The back office is slower to get with the program, but even it will be remade by digital tech, according CIO Michael Macrie.

video:video.video:title: Digital transformation objectives: Streamlining data with AI
video:video.video:description: In this video, Bill Gillis, CIO at Beth Israel Deaconess Care Organization, says utilizing AI and machine learning in data processing tops his digital transformation objectives list.

video:video.video:title: Digital transformation program: How to drive business success
video:video.video:description: When embarking on their digital transformation journey, CIOs must first understand the problems they are trying to solve. CIO Bill Gillis explains why.

video:video.video:title: The impact of mobile technology on business operations
video:video.video:description: The impact of mobile technology on business is becoming more evident as mobile computing moves to take over the enterprise.

video:video.video:title: The difference between pipe and platform business models
video:video.video:description: Sangeet Paul Choudary, founder and CEO at advisory and research firm, Platformation Labs, explains the difference between platform business models and traditional pipe models.
